component.name: Boop-GTK
component.summary: Port of IvanMathy's Boop to GTK, a scriptable scratchpad for developers.

description.p: Paste text, transform it (with user extendible javascipt), move on. Stop pasting sensitive infomation into sketchy sites to format JSON, compute a hash, etc.

ul.li: Added Ctrl+Q shortcut to quit
Search now looks at the description and tags on scripts
Errors and infomation are now notifications removing the need for the status bar
Added version number to the about dialog
11 new scripts from Boop 1.3.0 including: SpONGeCASe, PHP Unserialize, JSON to YAML, SHA256 hash, and more!
Update to flatpak runtime 20.08
New icon
Stability improvements
Fixed bug that caused high CPU usage.
Add script authors to the credit section in the about dialog.
Upgrade dependencies
Add `isSelection` to input argument of main, `isSelection` is true when text is selected in the buffer and false otherwise.
Fixed an issue that crashed Boop-GTK when requiring scripts with syntax errors
Use the correct icon for the primary menu
Fix issues in desktop and metainfo files
Installer available for Windows
Stability improvements
Fix JWT decoder script (for more infomation, see the release notes of Boop 1.2.1).
Remove unsafe Rust sections
Compatability with Boop 1.2.0 scripts (`state.insert(..)` and `require(..)`).
Custom icons for scripts from Boop.
Windows build available
Application menu with links to config directory and website to get more scripts.
Scripts now retain the enviroment they where executed in to match Boop
